author: remm
msg: - Update the document on how to build, mentioning JDK 1.3 instead of 1.2.

author: remm
msg: - This should allow running Tomcat with JDK 1.2 again

author: remm
msg: - Changes to the order of initialization and shutdown of the components
- The ENC is now available during startup and shutdown of the manager
(bug 7850). This does not appear to create problems.
- Includes the patch for bug 7971 (submitted by Andreas Junghans <Andreas.Junghans at fh-karlsruhe.de>).

author: manveen
msg: Enabled create (all 5 types of valves) and remove valve actions from the properties list under host.
